CustomField.formula:
if ( AND ( Text(Status) = 'Termin√©' , Duree_Intervention__c <> 0 , NOT(ISBLANK(Duree_Intervention__c )) , NOT(ISBLANK(Date_Heure_Depart__c )) , NOT(ISBLANK(Date_Heure_Arrivee__c )) , NOT(ISBLANK(Date_Heure_Fin__c )) , NOT(ISBLANK(text(Origine__c ))) , NOT(ISBLANK(text(type_OE__c ))) , NOT(ISBLANK(text(Anomalie__c )))
) , true , false )
CustomField.label: Intervention conforme
